name: The Adventure of TED and the lost magic crystals
name_original: The Adventure of TED and the lost magic crystals
description:
The Adventures of TED and the lost magic Crystals is a casual 2.5D Low poly Platformer Adventure game,
A story about Young TED who is interested in finding the lost magic crystals, the source of life for the squirrel's kingdom. TED is interested because of the reward, of course...
He doesn't want to be a hero.
But the journey is not easy, Young TED must face many obstacles along the way.

• Consists of 31 levels

• Fight giant boss

• Cool cinematic and action

• Items or Secret to find and collect

• Unlock All in-game Achievements


Classic 2.5D Platformer Adventure game from RgamesID, Bringing you a nostalgic look to the Golden era of world console games with 3D Low poly Graphics.
